title: TJ-Neary/CoreRag
summary: Local-first knowledge engine with semantic search, GraphRAG, and Claude Desktop integration via MCP. Features hybrid search (vector + BM25), cross-encoder reranking, multi-format document ingestion (PDF, DOCX, audio, video), and privacy-preserving PII detection. Apple Silicon optimized.

title: Erick-Bryan-Cubas/green-deck
summary: Green Deck - AI Powered Intelligent Flashcard Generator 🎈

title: sudoleg/YouTubeGPT
summary: YouTubeGPT is an LLM-based web-app that can be run locally and allows you to summarize and chat (Q&A) with YouTube videos.

title: smallthinkingmachines/harombe
summary: The full-stack agent framework that runs entirely on your hardware.

title: RicherTunes/Brainarr
summary: Local AI Music Discovery for Lidarr - Brainarr is a privacy-focused AI-powered import list plugin for Lidarr that generates intelligent music recommendations using local AI models. It exclusively supports local providers (Ollama, LM Studio) to ensure your music preferences never leave your network.

title: Xzeroone/The_Swarm
summary: Autonomous self-improving agent that writes, tests, and improves its own code using local LLMs. 100% offline, zero API keys.

title: lingmengcan/lingmengcan
summary: AIGC Application Platform: Lingmengcan AI, large language model, aigc, stable diffusion, langchainjs, nestjs, vue3, naive ui, DeepSeek, chromadb

title: bug-ops/zeph
summary: Production-ready AI agent runtime in Rust — hybrid inference across Ollama, Claude, OpenAI & HuggingFace with multi-model orchestration, skill-based tool use with self-learning, RAG via Qdrant, MCP integration, A2A protocol. CLI + Telegram.

title: arrase/ollama-agent
summary: Ollama Agent is a powerful command-line tool (CLI and REPL) that allows you to interact with local AI models.

summary: User-friendly AI Interface (Supports Ollama, OpenAI API, ...)
